岟岟岟

岟字的基本解释

岟
yǎng
〔岟崥（
b?）〕山脚，如“崔嵬不崩，赖彼岟岟。”

岟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎng］
［《廣韻》於兩切，上養，影。］
(1)山脚。参见“岟崥”。
(2)深邃。

岟字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　岟； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页308第36
【廣韻】於兩切【集韻】【韻會】倚朗切【正韻】於黨切，?泱上聲。【廣韻】山足也。【集韻】山貌。【左思·魏都賦】山林幽岟。【註】岟，深邃也。

岟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
岟字的起名意思

暂无。

Xi
Basic explanation of words
Xi
yǎng
〔岟崥(
b?)] at the foot of the mountain, such as "Cui Wei does not collapse, Lai Bixian."
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎng］
["Guang Yun" in two cuts, upper support, shadow. ]
(1) The foot of the mountain. See "Baying".
(2) Profound.
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　岟; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 308 36
[Guang Yun] Yu Liangqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Yi Langqie [Zheng Yun] Yu Dangqie, sound? [Guang Yun] Mountain foot also. 【Jiyun】Mountain appearance. [Zuo Si·Wei Du Fu] The mountains and forests are quiet. [Note] Xi, also profound.
